title: How to Make Freezer Pickles

steps.headline: Place a crumpled piece of waxed paper on top of each container.
Combine cucumbers, onions, and canning salt in a large bowl.
Cover with water and let soak 3 hours.
In a saucepan, combine sugar, vinegar, and celery seed.
steps.description: Heat, but not to a boil. # Pour over cucumbers and freeze in freezer containers.

text: First recipe Make syrup, bring to boil. Let cool. Slice cucumbers very thin. Do not peel. Fill freezer containers 3/4 full.  Pour syrup over cucumbers.  Place a crumpled piece of waxed paper on top of each container. Cover and freeze. Makes 5 pints.  Second recipe Combine cucumbers, onions, and canning salt in a large bowl.  Cover with water and let soak 3 hours.  Pour liquid off.  In a saucepan, combine sugar, vinegar, and celery seed. Heat, but not to a boil. # Pour over cucumbers and freeze in freezer containers. Thaw in refrigerator before serving.  Yield: 4 pints.
